name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
tagline: Connecting the world through innovative electronic solutions

overview.introduction: The Department of Electronics & Communication Engineering focuses on developing expertise in electronic devices, communication systems, and signal processing while emphasizing emerging technologies.
overview.description: Our curriculum combines fundamental electronics and communication principles with modern technologies in VLSI design, wireless communication, and embedded systems. Students gain practical experience through hands-on projects and industry collaborations.

programs.name: B.Tech in Electronics & Communication Engineering
programs.description: Comprehensive program covering electronic devices, communication systems, signal processing, and VLSI design with focus on emerging technologies.

labs.name: VLSI Design Laboratory
labs.description: Advanced facility for designing and testing integrated circuits.

labs.name: Communication Systems Laboratory
labs.description: Modern laboratory for studying communication systems and protocols.

faculty.name: Dr. Arun Verma
faculty.bio: Dr. Arun Verma specializes in VLSI design with expertise in digital electronics and embedded systems.

faculty.name: Dr. Sneha Patel
faculty.bio: Dr. Sneha Patel focuses on wireless communication and signal processing with expertise in 5G technologies.
